items.sentence: Tom and Mary have been talking to each other all morning.
Tom was Mary\'s only friend when she was in kindergarten.
Is there an English-Japanese dictionary on the bookshelf?
It made her jealous to see him walking with another girl.
Did Tom tell you about what he and Mary did last weekend?
Did anyone tell Tom what time he was supposed to be here?
Do you know how much it costs to get to Boston from here?
Do you really think that Tom will come back to Australia?
I promised myself I wouldn\'t complain about Tom anymore.
I received an invitation from Tom, but didn\'t accept it.
I should\'ve never walked so much in a new pair of shoes.
Tom\'s performance was not up to his fans\' expectations.
You must take into account the fact that he is too young.
You should have told me that you wanted me to come alone.
Tom noticed that he and Mary were finally alone together.
Tom peeked out the window to see if it was safe to leave.
Tom picked up one of the cans, opened it, and took a sip.
Thank you for giving me the time I needed to finish this.
Tom doesn\'t know who Mary wants to go to the dance with.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary lies to him, but I know she does.
